channel.title: Problem with: run.bat
channel.description:
[b]BTW I HAVE WINDOWS 7[/b] My run.bat opens and closes really fast. When I use the auto restarer, it says: [code] Made by SiCKO. Add xboxmodder16@hotmail.com on msn if you have any questions / comments / concerns. Please make sure your runserver file is named run.bat How often would you like to restart? (In Minutes) 30 'Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. [/code]
This is what my compiler is(if this helps any)[it works btw]: [code] @echo off "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_17/bin/javac.exe" ./*.java pause [/code]

item.title: Problem with: run.bat
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:2, topic:322029”]david remove the ./ off your compiler that isnt need only the *. is

if the run opens and closes fast check your voule.bat see if something is wrong with it or it is done right thats all i can say[/quote]
I fixed it. But now when I go to my client and compile, then run, it says “Cannot fined EGUI, program will close”
This is it’s code(run):

@echo off
cd Java Files
@title Project Purple
START JAVAW -Xmx500m EGUI

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with: run.bat
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

BTW I HAVE WINDOWS 7
My run.bat opens and closes really fast. When I use the auto restarer, it says:

Made by SiCKO. Add xboxmodder16@hotmail.com on msn
if you have any questions / comments / concerns.
Please make sure your runserver file is named run.bat
How often would you like to restart? (In Minutes) 30
'Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

This is what my compiler is(if this helps any)[it works btw]:

@echo off
"C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_17/bin/javac.exe" ./*.java
pause

Read full topic
